name: Swimming in Two Rivers
summary: Why is taking the third option sometimes the best option when it comes to choosing the right girl? Read as a rich kid tries to get out of a typical love triangle rut.
info:
• 游戏类型: Visual Novel
  • 游戏引擎: Ren'Py
